name: Birds Blast Mania
description:
Birds Blast Mania: is a simple but addiction with colorful and fun match-3 puzzle.

===== How To Play =====
- Tap 2 Or More Adjacent Birds Of The Same To Get Birds
- Achieve Required Score and Target To Pass Levels, No Time Limit
- The Higher Score You Will Get

===== Birds Blast Mania Features =====
- 200 Brand New Levels Which Are Full Of Interesting Birds
- Popular And Classic Gameplay
- Colorful And Delicate Cube Design
- Playing addictive game for FREE
